title: Jericho (2006 TV Series) Title Card Font
content:
The font used for the title of the TV Show Jericho isn’t a custom font is it? I know that some movies and TV shows use vague fonts.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Jericho.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064735/http:/typophile.com/files/Jericho.jpg) | 66.5 KB |

 [‹ (x) UPN "Tonight" ident - Comsat-Station {Florian R}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064735/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40113 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Neutral grotesque on Michael Maltzan Architecture poster - Akkurat {Simon H} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064735/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40131 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Mullet Man

comments.content: It’s a grunged up version of Trade Gothic. That’s what the non-distressed type at the bottom is set in.

Certainly is very close. The J and R are slightly different though.

Thanks!
You’re right — I was too hasty to assume a relationship between the title of the show and the text below.
